---
title: "DataWidening"
author: "Sean Leader"
date: '2022-10-04'
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
df = read_csv("Final Data/AgeBySex21Final.csv")
```

```{r}
df %>% group_by(County, Age, Year) %>% summarise(my_sum = sum(`Age Group Estimate`)) %>% pivot_wider(names_from = Age, values_from = my_sum) %>% write.csv(.,file = "AgeWider.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
```{r}
df2 = read_csv("Final Data/IncomeEstimatesFinal.csv")
```
```{r}
df2 %>% group_by(County, Age, Year) %>% summarise(my_sum = sum(`Age Group Estimate`)) %>% pivot_wider(names_from = Age, values_from = my_sum) %>% write.csv(.,file = "AgeWider.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
